<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE document SYSTEM "CommonMark.dtd">
<document xmlns="http://commonmark.org/xml/1.0">
  <code_block info="r" xml:space="preserve" name="">cat(paste0("[", guest_editors$name, "](https://github.com/", guest_editors$github, ")", collapse = " \U00B7 "))
</code_block>
</document>
